name: Unchained
title: Why USDS Is Growing Organically on Base - Unchained w/ Stani Kulechov & Rune Christensen
text:
Synopsis
Ethereum DeFi demonstrates an exceptionally strong network effect, with organic growth driven by economic momentum that significantly outweighs technological or cultural factors.

Key Insights
- USDS (stablecoin) is experiencing rapid organic growth on the Base blockchain
- The USDS supply increased by two billion in just a few weeks on mainnet
- The speaker emphasizes that economic inertia is approximately 90% of what matters in crypto ecosystems
- Ethereum DeFi is characterized by a powerful network effect that enables self-sustaining growth
- The scale of Ethereum's DeFi ecosystem is described as "huge" and growing independently
